aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: defaultAdminShell

aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: The request for quotation represents the data structure to configure a manufacturing request and send this to a supplier receive a quotation

aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: The request for quotation represents the data structure to configure a manufacturing request and send this to a supplier receive a quotation
all properties necessary for identification of the request for quotation
digital address of the sender (e.g.token, IP address, link, user account)
internal identifier in user account
name for the request for user account management (usually name of the part to be manufactured)
date and time of the request in user account
all information to configure a request for quotation
file document
RFQ-Configuration: CAD file format
part contained in the CAD file, to be defined in RFQ configuration
identifier of the part from CAD File
name of the part in CAD file. In case the CAD file has only one part, this could also be the file name.
domain of required process (e.g. subtractive manufacturing, additive manufacturing, assembly)
manufacturing method depending on the domain (e.g. milling, powder bed fusion, welding,?)
reference to the bill of process model
after manufacturing typically post processes are necessary, depending on the manufacturing method
process group is depending on the defined manufacturing method and defines the general treatment
specific process out of the process group
additional property based on the post process type
RFQ-Configuration: selection of defined tolerance classes
RFQ-Configuration: specific requirements to guarantee quality
RFQ-Configuration: check if a test part is required, makes only sens for batches
Comprises the number of objects and the unit of measurement for the respective child objects
The number of objects related to the measurement unit
Unit of Measurement for the quantity of serialized objects
object with all information about material of a part to be manufactured
the material item is a detailed element to describe the material and has a value and a type, like value=2.7, type=density g/m3 or value=AlMgMn, type=chemical
value to detail the part material item
value type to detail the part material item
definition of material group for pre-selection

aas:langStringNameType.aas:text: Single Level Bill of Material as Built reference

aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: The single-level bill of material represents one sub-level of an assembly and does not include any lower-level subassemblies. The as-built lifecycle references all child items as manufactured by the manufacturer referencing only child items in an as built lifecycle themselves, e.g. serial parts or batches.
Set of child items, of which the given parent item is assembled by (one structural level down).
Catena-X ID and meta data of the assembled child item.
Timestamp when the relation between the parent item and the child item was created, e.g. when the serialized child part was assembled into the given part.
Comprises the number of objects and the unit of measurement for the respective child objects
The number of objects related to the measurement unit
Unit of Measurement for the quantity of serialized objects
Timestamp when the assembly relationship between parent item and child item was last modified.
The Catena-X ID of the given part (e.g. the assembly), valid for the Catena-X dataspace.
The supplier of the given child item.
The Catena-X ID of the given part (e.g. the assembly), valid for the Catena-X dataspace.
RFQ-Configuration: Date of desired, first, but not must delivery
RFQ-Configuration: date of required and last acceptable delivery
RFQ-Configuration: placeholder for any kind of additional comments
file document
all data about sender of request for quotation, important for offer and delivery
RFQ-Sender: name of the sender
RFQ-Sender: BPDM/ or fill in by the customer, address of sender
RFQ-Sender: BPDM/ or fill in by the customer, company name of sender
RFQ-Sender: BPDM/ or fill in by the customer, e-mail address of sender
RFQ-Sender: BPDM/ or fill in by the customer, phone number of sender
RFQ-Sender: BPDM/ or fill in by the customer, address of sender for account
RFQ-Sender: BPDM/ or fill in by the customer, address of sender for delivery
RFQ-Sender: filled by customer, any kind of delivery requirements
header information by Catena-X
CX-Header: BPN identification of sender partner
CX-Header: BPN identification of recipient partner
CX-Header: description of use case context
CX-Header: identifier used by RFQ protocol
CX-Header: time stamp, when message is sent. The value MUST be formatted according to the ISO 8601 standard.
CX-Header: version of RFQ data structure
The request for quotation represents the data structure to configure a manufacturing request and send this to a supplier receive a quotation

aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: The request for quotation represents the data structure to configure a manufacturing request and send this to a supplier receive a quotation
digital address of the sender (e.g.token, IP address, link, user account)
internal identifier in user account
name for the request for user account management (usually name of the part to be manufactured)
date and time of the request in user account
all properties necessary for identification of the request for quotation
CAD file as geometry definition, e.g. step file
CAD file format
identifier of the part from CAD File
name of the part in CAD file. In case the CAD file has only one part, this could also be the file name
domain of required process (e.g. subtractive manufacturing, additive manufacturing, assembly)
manufacturing method depending on the domain (e.g. milling, powder bed fusion, welding,?)
list of processes to manufacture the part(s)
process group is depending on the defined manufacturing method and defines the general treatment
specific process out of the process group
additional property based on the post process type
after manufacturing typically post processes are necessary, depending on the manufacturing method
selection of defined tolerance classes
specific requirements to guarantee quality
check if a test part is required, makes only sens for batches
Quantifiable number of objects in reference to the measurementUnit
Describes a Property containing a reference to one of the units in the Unit Catalog.
Describes the quantity in which the child item is assembled in the given parent item by providing a quantity value and the measurement unit in which the quantity is measured.
value to detail the part material item
value type to detail the part material item
set of elements to detail material items
definition of material group for pre-selection
material definition with further information
list of parts contained in the CAD file, to be defined in RFQ configuration
Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.
Quantifiable number of objects in reference to the measurementUnit
Describes a Property containing a reference to one of the units in the Unit Catalog.
Describes the quantity in which the child item is assembled in the given parent item by providing a quantity value and the measurement unit in which the quantity is measured.
Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.
Trait to ensure UUID v4 data format.
Trait to ensure data format for BPNL.
Set of child items the parent item is assembled by (one structural level down).
Trait to ensure UUID v4 data format.
reference to the single level bill of material as built
delivery date
delivery date
placeholder for any kind of additional comments
in case there are additional documents or files to share
all information to configure a request for quotation
name of the sender
address of sender
company name of sender
e-mail address of sender
phone number of sender
address of sender for account
address of sender for delivery
any kind of delivery requirements
all data about sender of request for quotation, important for offer and delivery
Trait to ensure data format for BPNL.
Trait to ensure data format for BPNL.
description of use case context
Trait to ensure UUID v4 data format.
time stamp, when message is sent
version of RFQ data structure
header information by Catena-X
